properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from High Island to Freeport TX out 20 NM; Galveston Bay
properties.headline: Special Marine Warning issued January 23 at 1:29AM CST until January 23 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in League City has issued a

* Special Marine Warning for...
Coastal waters from High Island to Freeport TX out 20 NM...
Galveston Bay...

* Until 200 AM CST.

* At 128 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing
waterspouts was located near Offatts Bayou, or 7 nm northeast of
West Bay, moving east at 15 knots.

HAZARD...Waterspouts and wind gusts to 40 knots.

SOURCE...Radar.

IMPACT...Waterspouts can easily overturn boats and create locally
hazardous seas. Small craft could be damaged in briefly
higher winds and suddenly higher waves.

* Locations impacted include...
Galveston Causeway, Galveston Ship Channel, Offatts Bayou,
Galveston Pier 21, Galveston Bay Entrance and northeastern West
Bay.

This warning also includes the following channel lights...

Galveston Channel Lighted Buoy 1...
Galveston Bay Entrance Channel Lighted Buoy 3...
Galveston Channel Light 3...
Galveston Bay Entrance Channel Lighted Buoy 7...
Galveston Bay Entrance Channel Lighted Buoy 7A...
Galveston Bay Entrance Channel Lighted Buoy 5...
Galveston Bay Entrance Channel Lighted Buoy 12...
Galveston Bay Entrance Channel Lighted Buoy 10...
Galveston Channel Light 2 and
Galveston Bay Entrance Channel Lighted Buoy 8.
